title: WTB Low grade Mathewson or Johnson

posts.post_title: WTB Low grade Mathewson or Johnson
posts.post_content: Looking for  a Black cap Matty, or either Johnson. Looking for low grade. A or 1.

I have a raw Matty in fair-good condition (ink stamp, pencil marks, and small spot of paper loss) with superior color/eye appeal. Can send scans to your email if $250 is in your price range. My email is [url]gscheyd at hotmail dot com[/url].

SGC 10 (Poor 1) Dark Cap Presents Well  Horz. crease  $225 Del.  Polar Bear Back Accept Paypal

Let me know if interested.
